movie.title: End of the Trail
movie.description_intro: The brothers McKay go to the mountains to release the ashes of their recently deceased father. They will be together for the first time in years and they will either reconnect with their Father and each other, or they will say goodbye to him and never see each other again.
movie.description_full: The brothers McKay go to the mountains to release the ashes of their recently deceased father. They will be together for the first time in years and they will either reconnect with their Father and each other, or they will say goodbye to him and never see each other again.

movies.title: Hombre
movies.summary: John 'Hombre' Russell is a white man raised by the Apaches on an Indian reservation and later by a white man in town. As an adult he prefers to live on the reservation. He is informed that he has inherited a lodging-house in the town. He goes to the town and decides to trade the place for a herd. He has to go to another city. The only stagecoach is one being hired for a special trip paid by Faver and his wife Audra. As there are several seats others join the stagecoach making seven very different passengers in all. During the journey they are robbed. With the leadership of John Russell they escape with little water and the money that the bandits want. They are pursued by the bandits. As they try to evade the bandits they reveal their true nature in a life threatening situation.

movies.title: Gregory's Girl
movies.summary: In his warm, Scottish coming-of-age film, gangly teen Gregory and his school-mates are starting to find out about girls. He fancies Dorothy, not least because she has got on to the football team (and is a better player than he). He finally asks her out, but it is obviously the females in control of matters here, and that very much includes Gregory's younger sister.

movies.title: Absurd
movies.summary: A priest-doctor chasing a man with supernatural regenerative abilities, who has recently escaped from a medical lab, reaches a small town where the mutant goes on a killing spree.
movies.description_full: A priest-doctor chasing a man with supernatural regenerative abilities, who has recently escaped from a medical lab, reaches a small town where the mutant goes on a killing spree.

movies.title: Savage X Fenty Show Vol. 2
movies.summary: A look into Rihanna's creative process for her latest lingerie collection, celebrating all genders and sizes, featuring performances by top music artists.
